column4: arrgh i used to find that d-link dwl-122 for around 10 bucks now the cheepest i can find is 35 :-X
torrents usually run the fastest for my downloads
I don't see torrents beating the 700 - 800kB/s I get downloading the ISO :)
700 - 800 kb/s  :0....... what freaking isp do u have??
cable internet to an aussie mirror :)
thats crazy. we have "highspeed roadrunner broadband" but its slow as hell
the other day I was downloading a livecd and an ISO (ISO was coming down at 700 - 800kB/s..the livecd was coming down at 400kB/s)
mmk mmk, u made me jealous lets leave it at that ok? XD
haha it takes me a few hrs just to dl the livecd
I cry if it takes more than 10 minutes :\
i hate you. lol
that's why your internet sucks..yeah blame mac!
wut wut wut???????? dont get me started on how mac rocks the world
prolly wouldnt get much support in a linux channel though XD
I absolutely LOVE the minimise effects on OSX :) ....but I'm happy to say that I successfully locked up the G4 at work the other day :D
hold shift when using F9, F10, and F11
you can see the swooshy fx better :-p
I'm sorry but any computer that by default comes with a one button mouse with no scroll wheel is an abomination in the eyes of god
dont need a scroll-wheel, i put 2 fingers on my trackpad and move up & down to scroll. so there :P
and click+hold my friend XD
not the point!
I just want them to bring a KDE theme that mimics an OSX machine :D
